## lowerCase() function

Converts the given string to lowercase.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function lowerCase(str: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | The string to convert to lowercase. |

**Returns:**

string

The lowercase version of the input string.
